Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Traded from San Diego to Texas on 2/17/1989 (Going to SD: P Greg A. Harris, LF Randy Ready. Going to TEX: 1B Kevin Maas)...
